title: Can I refund my Border and Icon? (not what i thought it was)
body:
Greetings League of Legends Staff!

I bought the 10$ chaos bundle and eventually got the Border and Icon for Nightbringer Yasuo, and I didn't realize that the border ONLY worked on Nightbringer Yasuo, I thought it was just a border available to you if you had that and it would be seen on every champion, not just Yasuo with that specific skin.

So, I want to kindly ask the League of Legends Staff if I could get a refund on it, I dont have any refunds available on my account and I was wondering if I could get a refund just on the tokens not the money.

Unless I'm mistaken and it's just bugging out, and I can't see the border (I'm still not 100% sure about it), I would like a refund.

Kindly,
One of your loyal players.

replies.body: That border is meant for the Nightbringer Yasuo skin only. I'm not 100% sure about refunds on the tokens, since they're already been spent and you don't have refund tokens left. I definitely don't want to steer you wrong though, so I'd reach out to the experts on our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to go over what happened, and let you know what they can do to help!
